skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Seal Scroll
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of stealing 1 random buff from each enemy. 

After stealing, applies a [Buff Spread] effect, taking a random buff from this Champion and placing it on all allies.
skills.name: Thief of Blood
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Can target dead or living enemies. 
 
If the target is dead, places [Block revive] on them, then attacks all enemies. Each enemy will receive damage equal to 20% of the target enemy's MAX HP. If the target is a Boss' minion, the damage is equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP. This attack cannot be critical, and will ignore any [Shield] buffs and 100% of each target's DEF.
 
If the target is alive, places a [True Fear] debuff on them for 2 turns and heals all allies by 20% of the target enemy's MAX HP. If the target is a Boss or a Boss' minion, the healing is equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP. The [True Fear] debuff cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Dread Invocation

skills.desc:
Revives 1 random ally with 30% HP and 30% Turn Meter each time an enemy is killed. 

Will not revive an ally if an enemy is killed by damage from [Poison], [HP Burn], or [Bomb] debuffs, or from [Reflect Damage] buffs.
skills.name: Soul Charge [P]
